Constructor Detail

SearchAttachment

public SearchAttachment(java.lang.String datatypeCode,
                        java.lang.String documentId,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        java.lang.String fileName)
Create the search attachment.

Parameters:
datatypeCode - datatype code.
documentId - unique document id.
title - title to show the user.
description - description, possibly null and if so will default to the title.
fileName - file name, url or uri.
Method Detail

fromXML

public static java.util.List<SearchAttachment> fromXML(java.lang.String searchString,
                                                       java.lang.String xml)
Turn xml into a List of SearchAttachments.

Parameters:
searchString - the search String, may be used to hilight search terms.
xml - xml, of the form:

 <Attachments>
     <Attachment documentId="300100025673776" datatypeCode="TEXT" title="CustomGroupTitle" description="CustomGroupDescription" fileName="CustomGroup" />
     <Attachment documentId="300100024972776" datatypeCode="FILE" title="Employee.java" fileName="Employee.java" />
 </Attachments>
Returns:
A List of Search Attachments, possibly empty but never null.

isDirectlyClickable

public boolean isDirectlyClickable()
Can a goLink be rendered and have the user go to that link with NO server processing. Only for stored URLs.

Returns:
true if WEB_PAGE == datatypeCode

isIndirectlyClickable

public boolean isIndirectlyClickable()
Can a commandLink be rendered that results in serverside processing to generate a URL that is sent to the client for redirect.

Returns:
true if TMURI == datatypeCode

isFileDownload

public boolean isFileDownload()
Can we use a file Download Listener to download the file.

Returns:
true if FILE == datatypeCode or TEXT == datatypeCode

compareTo

public int compareTo(SearchAttachment that)
Do comparison of this Attachment to that based on the lowercase title.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<SearchAttachment>
Parameters:
that - other Object to compare.
Returns:
a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.

openIndirectlyClickableAttachment

public void openIndirectlyClickableAttachment(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent e)
An action listener that uses javascript to open the attachment. This will trigger the popup blocker. This is used for TMURI attachments which need a lookup of the web app.

Parameters:
e -

Get the filname/URL/URI for this attachment.

isIconURLExists

public boolean isIconURLExists()
Does an Icon exist for this attachment. This is based on the file extension. The iconUrl property will be loaded by calling this method.

Returns:
true if icon exists, false otherwise.

getIconURL

public java.lang.String getIconURL()
Get the Icon URL for this attachment, null if none is relevant

Returns:
icon url.
